content: Thank you for choosing our AI-driven skincare solution! Your feedback is crucial for us to improve and tailor our products more closely to your needs. Please take a few moments to share your thoughts with us.

questions.question: Which product variation did you prefer, A or B?
Please share why this variation worked better for you.
On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the AI's product recommendation?
On a scale of 1-5, how effectively did our AI understand and address your skin concerns?
Do you have any specific feedback or suggestions for our AI's functionality?
We're always looking to improve our website's usability. Do you have any suggestions for making our web interface more user-friendly?
If we were to charge for our personalized skincare service, what price would you consider fair and why?
Would you be interested in ordering from us again?
Would you like to sign up for notifications about new or improved formulas?
Is there anything else you'd like to share about your experience with us?

content: Please review your answers before submitting. Thank you for your valuable feedback!
